name: aluix
description: aLuix â€” A futuristic, modular SCSS + JS UI framework that extends Bootstrap with advanced utilities, animations, and clipping effects for next-generation web design.
author: Alif Design Studio & aLuix

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npx mkdirp dist/css dist/js && npm run css:build && npm run js:build && npm run add:banners
scripts.css:build: npm run css:normal && npm run css:minify
scripts.css:normal: npx sass scss/aluix.scss dist/css/aluix.css --style=expanded && npx sass scss/aluix-clip.scss dist/css/aluix-clip.css --style=expanded && npx sass scss/aluix-animation.scss dist/css/aluix-animation.css --style=expanded && npx sass scss/aluix-utilities.scss dist/css/aluix-utilities.css --style=expanded
scripts.css:minify: npx sass scss/aluix.scss dist/css/aluix.min.css --style=compressed && npx sass scss/aluix-clip.scss dist/css/aluix-clip.min.css --style=compressed && npx sass scss/aluix-animation.scss dist/css/aluix-animation.min.css --style=compressed && npx sass scss/aluix-utilities.scss dist/css/aluix-utilities.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.js:build: npm run js:copy && npm run js:bundle && npm run js:minify
scripts.js:copy: npx mkdirp dist/js && npx copyfiles -f js/aluix.js js/aluix-animation.js dist/js
scripts.js:minify: npx terser dist/js/aluix.js -o dist/js/aluix.min.js --compress --mangle --comments '/^!/' && npx terser dist/js/aluix-animation.js -o dist/js/aluix-animation.min.js --compress --mangle --comments '/^!/' && npx terser dist/js/aluix.bundle.js -o dist/js/aluix.bundle.min.js --compress --mangle --comments '/^!/'
